power.elementalorigins.damage_air_fire.d: You're weak to fire. 20% of the dammage you deal to fire elementals will be sent back towards you, fire elementals deal 20% more damage to you, and fire-attuned blocks damage you.
power.elementalorigins.damage_air_life.d: Living beings absorb your essence when they breath. 20% of the dammage you deal to life elementals will be sent back towards you, life elementals deal 20% more damage to you, and life attuned blocks damage you.
power.elementalorigins.multi_jump.name: Multi-Jump
power.elementalorigins.multi_jump.descri: You can jump midair with a 2.5 second cooldown.
